sentences.sentence: Barite is one of the weighting materials.
sentences.translation: 重晶石粉是加重材料的一种。

sentences.sentence: Prismatic crystal of Barite on Calcite crystals.
sentences.translation: 柱状晶形的重晶石在方解石晶簇上。

sentences.sentence: Actual Barite consumption will depend on hole condition while drilling.
sentences.translation: 实际的重晶石用量取决于井下的实际需要。
